channel.title: Show Off
channel.description:
Many threads in the "Server Development" section have some kind of "showing off". So to save some useless topic starters, Lets bring all those "show offs" here. Whether its a edited client, some html, a new skill, or just the amount of people on your server, [b]anything[/b] related to rsc servers. This thread is [b]NOT[/b] for flaming eachothers show offs. If you dont like someones creation/edit/development then take it else where. Creativity people.
For now on when I update the thread I will put the update date next to the title "Show Off".
A Tip for everyone: If your going to show something off, try to bring something to the table no other person has or has seen before.
~~~Directory~~~ Page 1 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2979343.html#msg2979343] Loading and login images[/url] : Shadowsoul [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2979366.html#msg2979366]XtreME Pk[/url] : Adu [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2979476.html#msg2979476]Sleeping[/url] : Gawdz666
Page 2 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2979558.html#msg2979558]Report Player[/url] : Shadowsoul [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2979611.html#msg2979611]Sleeping[/url] : Adu [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2980195.html#msg2980195]Rsca control panel[/url] : RSCAngel [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2981270.html#msg2981270]Control panel[/url] : Mapu
Page 3 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2981513.html#msg2981513]Stat Editor[/url] : Ecko [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2983104.html#msg2983104]Rsc Control Panel[/url] : T X [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2983269.html#msg2983269]Client Interface?[/url] : Iron Maiden
Page 4 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg2995817.html#msg2995817] Client + Buy n Sell Feature [/url] : xx c1ph3r xx [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3001172.html#msg3001172]Ball @ Man [/url] : Motaro [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3002457.html#msg3002457]Rsca Control Panel + Bugzy Videos[/url] : RSCAngel
Page 5 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3003575.html#msg3003575]Rsc Interface Creator [/url] : Mapu [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3004756.html#msg3004756]Rsc Interface Creator [/url] : Starhooper [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3005293.html#msg3005293]Rsc Interface Creator (Not so ugly) [/url] Starhooper [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3004816.html#msg3004816]Rsc Interface[/url] : xEnt
Page 6 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3062319.html#msg3062319]RSCEmulation Staff Panel[/url] : Kryptix [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3063452.html#msg3063452]RSCEmulation Highscores[/url] : Kryptix [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3064617.html#msg3064617]RSCEmulation Landscape[/url] : Liquidazer
Page 7 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3065580.html#msg3065580]RSCEmulation Highscores[/url] : Kryptix [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3066886.html#msg3066886]Cannons[/url] : Adu
Page 9 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3104073.html#msg3104073]Highscores[/url] : T X
Page 10 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3111965.html#msg3111965]Smithing Interface[/url] : Peeter [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3141750.html#msg3141750]Model Converter[/url] : xEnt [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3141903.html#msg3141903]Moder Converter Tested[/url] : xEnt [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3205361.html#msg3205361]Model Constructor[/url] : Sean425
Page 11 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3206123.html#msg3206123]EasyRsc Highscores[/url] : Snoopy89 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3206168.html#msg3206168]Visual Basic Rsc[/url] : dimebagx [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3206700.html#msg3206700]Money Slot [/url] : Vortex
Page 12 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3207820.html#msg3207820]Rewritten Highscores[/url] : Kryptix [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3207876.html#msg3207876] Autorune [/url] : Gawdz666 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3208324.html#msg3208324] Autorune [/url] : Sean425 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3208331.html#msg3208331] C++ Landscape Editor [/url] : T x
Page 13 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3208967.html#msg3208967] C++ Landscape Editor [/url] : T x
Page 15 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3216303.html#msg3216303] 2d/3d Landscape Editor [/url] : T x [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3257389.html#msg3257389] Sean having trouble [/url] : Sean425 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3274329.html#msg3274329] Auction House [/url] : xEnt
Page 16 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3275285.html#msg3275285] Auction House [/url] : xEnt [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3275874.html#msg3275874] Auction House [/url] : xEnt
Page 17 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3282551.html#msg3282551] Poison [/url] : Motaro
Page 19 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3331238.html#msg3331238] Yaw and Pitch[/url] : CodeForFame [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3333249.html#msg3333249] Withdraw Feature [/url] : Motaro
Page 20 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3333953.html#msg3333953] Client Sided Control Panel [/url] : Rsclives [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402000.msg3334763.html#msg3334763] Interface [/url] : CodeForFame

item.title: Show Off
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

My 350 MHz computer with about 128 MB RAM handled it pretty OK back then. Well, at least it was playable. But then also, I had nothing to compare with either.

About running on ARM… Yes, it’s possible. Support for Java 8 exists. At work, we’re eventually going to create a version of our software running on an embedded system with ARM.

item.title: Show Off
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:909, topic:305768”]yeah i bet it wouldnt run on the pi my friend :- )

just a reminder that
Error - out of memory!
Close ALL unnecessary programs
and windows before loading the game
RuneScape needs about 48meg of spare RAM

yeah its really starting to look like the pi just won’t cut it

in all seriousness, depends on the jvm you’re using.
you could try running it in jamvm, the same jvm saurik is hosting in his cydia repo and it runs just fine on my ipod touch 2g which isnt as powerful as rpi http://jamvm.sourceforge.net/[/quote]model b on pi1 has 512mb of ram, a window manager as i mentioned before uses about 200mb.

Read full topic

item.title: Show Off
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:906, topic:305768”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=402000.msg4473956#msg4473956 date=1424661374]
quite impressive there guys, jumped on my phone at work and logged in and i like what i see. with the raspberry pi 2 supporting android any day now, this allows a $35 computer to play RSC
[/quote]what the hell you don’t need android to play rsc on a pi, or even a pi2 for that matter. just download raspbian if on pi1 or latest testing version of debian (jessie) if you’re on pi2, lastly install a window manager and java. it’s pretty easy.[/quote]
i have never actually tried it, but i assumed the normal java wasn’t available on arm devices? ima try this some time. and the pi1 would run it like shit imo

Read full topic

item.title: Show Off
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:895, topic:305768”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=402000.msg4466056#msg4466056 date=1420214444]

[quote author=vortex link=topic=402000.msg4466042#msg4466042 date=1420208056]

[quote author=imthenull link=topic=402000.msg4465327#msg4465327 date=1419730914]
it’s pretty nice to have a nearly 100% refactored client.

[/quote]where’s the code and why havent you pushed it to the public bitbucket repo? :S
[/quote]i shall, it will just have to wait until i get my internet back :S :S :S
[/quote]where is it? :~)[/quote]yo taylor… imma let u finish but beyonce had one of the best music videos of all time…!

let me clean the code up a little more then i’ll push it.

edit: i just remembered you guys already have the client, it’s mc 127. i did do some more minor refactoring to it so it’s sliiiiightttllyyyy more complete than whats on git. Heres the code from the demo, though.

[code=java]package sysdevs;

import jagex.client.GameAdapter;
import jagex.client.Model;
import jagex.client.Scene;
import jagex.client.Surface;

import java.awt.Graphics;
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Path;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

@SuppressWarnings(“serial”)
public final class ModelDemo extends GameAdapter {

public static void main(String[] args) {
	ModelDemo demo = new ModelDemo(500, 400);
	demo.startDemo();
} 

private final int width, height;

private final Surface screen;

private final Scene scene;

private Graphics graphics;

private Model active_model;

private int last_x, last_y;

private int cam_x = 0, cam_y = 0, cam_z = -500, cam_pitch = 128, cam_dist = 550;

public ModelDemo(int width, int height) {
	this.width = width;
	this.height = height;
	
	// throw in some arbitrary values for now
	screen = new Surface(width, height, 100, this);
	scene = new Scene(screen, 1000, 1000, 1000);
	scene.clip_far_3d = 2400;
	scene.clip_far_2d = 2400;
	scene.fog_falloff = 1;
	scene.fog_dist = 2300;
    scene.set_bounds(width / 2, height / 2, width / 2, height / 2, width, 9);
	scene.set_camera(cam_x, cam_y, cam_z, 912, cam_pitch*4, 0, cam_dist*2);
	scene.set_light(50, 10, -50, -10, -50);
}

public void startDemo() {
	start(width, height, "model demo", false);
}

@Override
public void load() {
	graphics = getGraphics();
	try {
		load_textures();
		active_model = load_model("fountain");
		scene.add(active_model);
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}	
}

@Override
public void display() {
	screen.rect_fill(0, 0, width, height, Surface.DARK_GRAY);
	scene.render();
	draw_sys_info();
	screen.copy(graphics, 0, 0);
}

@Override
public void on_mouse_click() {
	last_x = mouse_x;
	last_y = mouse_y;
}

@Override
public void on_mouse_drag() {
	if (active_model == null)
		return;
	
	int yaw = 0;
	int pitch = 0;
	if (mouse_x != last_x) {
		pitch = mouse_x - last_x;
		last_x = mouse_x;
	}

	if (mouse_y != last_y) {
		yaw = mouse_y - last_y;
		last_y = mouse_y;
	}

	yaw %= 256;
	pitch %= 256;
	active_model.rotate(yaw, -pitch, 0);
}

@Override
public void update() {
	int key = pressed_key;
	if (key == 'w' || key == 'W') {
		cam_z -= 2;
	}
	if (key == 's' || key == 's') {
		cam_z += 2;
	}
	if (key == 'a' || key == 'A') {
		cam_x -= 2;
	}
	if (key == 'd' || key == 'D') {
		cam_x += 2;
	}
	if (key == 1004) {
		cam_dist += 4;
	}
	if (key == 1005) {
		cam_dist -= 4;
	}
	if (key == 1006) {
		cam_pitch = (cam_pitch + 2) & 255;
	}
	if (key == 1007) {
		cam_pitch = (cam_pitch - 2) & 255;
	}
	scene.set_camera(cam_x, cam_y, cam_z, 912, cam_pitch*4, 0, cam_dist*2);
	scene.animate_texture(17);
}

int texture_cnt = 55;
int texture_start = 10;

private void load_textures() throws Exception {
	scene.textures_allocate(texture_cnt, 7, 11);
	
	for (int i = 0; i < texture_cnt; i++) {
		Path path = Paths.get("./textures/"+i+".dat");
		DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(Files.newInputStream(path));
		int size = dis.readByte() & 0xff;
		int pixel_len = dis.readInt();
		
		int[] pixels = new int[pixel_len];

		for (int j = 0; j < pixel_len; j++) {
			pixels[j] = dis.readInt();
		}
		dis.close();
		
		screen.sprite_define(0, pixels, size, size);
		screen.rect_fill(0, 0, size, size, Surface.MAGENTA);
		screen.sprite_plot(0, 0, 0);

		screen.row_sprite_define(texture_start + i, 0, 0, size, size);
		screen.sprite_posterize(texture_start + i);
		
		byte[] raster = screen.sprite_raster[texture_start + i];
		int[] palette = screen.sprite_palette[texture_start + i];
		scene.texture_define(i, raster, palette, (size / 64) - 1);
	}
}

private Model load_model(String name) throws Exception {
	byte[] buf = Files.readAllBytes(Paths.get("./models/ob3/" + name + ".ob3"));
	Model model = new Model(buf, 0, false);
	model.scale(200, 200, 200);
	model.position(0, 0, 0);
	model.orient(0, 0, 0);
	model.set_light(true, 48, 48, -50, -10, -30);
	return model;
}

private void draw_sys_info() {
	Runtime r = Runtime.getRuntime();
	int total = (int) (r.totalMemory() / 1024L / 1024L);
	int avail = (int) ((r.totalMemory() - r.freeMemory()) / 1024L / 1024L);
	int x = 5;
	int y = 15;

	screen.text_draw("mem: " + avail + "MB/" + total + "MB", x, y, Surface.FONT_BOLD, Surface.YELLOW);
	y += Surface.text_height(Surface.FONT_BOLD);
	screen.text_draw("poly count: " + scene.last_poly_cnt, x, y, Surface.FONT_BOLD, Surface.YELLOW);
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
